mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin (aid, apwd, aname, aregdate, admin_item, admin_order, admin_members, admin_board, admin_add, admin_account, admin_admin, auth) VALUES (#{aid}, MD5(#{apwd}), #{aname}, NOW(), #{admin_item}, #{admin_order}, #{admin_members}, #{admin_board}, #{admin_add}, #{admin_account}, #{admin_admin}, #{auth})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM admin WHERE aid=#{aid}
